column1: Little Folk was a term for the Hobbits
column3: contrasting them to the Men of Bree (the Big Folk) as the two races live together in Bree-land.

column2: Boromir and Celeborn referred to the Hobbits of the Fellowship of the Ring as "little folk". Treebeard and Sharkeys Ruffians also referred to the Halflings in general as such
column3: and thus it may be assumed that the term was in common use.
